Name: LowPowerRateCoding
Title: Energy-Efficient Rate Coding for Synthetic Neuromorphic BCI
Experiment: Use rate-coded spike counts per channel with a linear decoder; sweep bin sizes and evaluate accuracy/compute trade-offs on synthetic classes.

Name: LatencyAwareDecoding
Title: Latency-Aware Spike Decoding with Lightweight Temporal Filters
Experiment: Introduce simple temporal filtering (moving average, exponential) prior to linear decoding; measure latency vs. accuracy on synthetic spike streams.

Name: RobustnessToDropout
Title: Robust Neuromorphic BCI Under Spike Dropout and Noise
Experiment: Simulate spike dropout/jitter and compare robustness across binning strategies and regularization settings; report accuracy degradation curves.

Name: TimeToFirstSpike
Title: Time-to-First-Spike Versus Rate Coding for Class Separation
Experiment: Compute time-to-first-spike features per channel and compare against rate coding for multiclass synthetic tasks under low compute budget.

Name: ChannelSelection
Title: Sparse Channel Selection for Neuromorphic Decoders
Experiment: Evaluate simple channel selection heuristics (variance, mutual info proxy) to reduce input dimensionality while maintaining accuracy.
